story.kicker_image_caption: F.I.R actress Manju Sharma will play Thandai Devi in The Kapil Sharma Show.
story.storykicker: Actress Manju Sharma, who has been part of Comedy Nights With Kapil, Chidiya Ghar and F.I.R in the past, will soon be seen on The Kapil Sharma Show as Thandai Devi.
story.storybody:
Actress Manju Sharma, who has played Girgit Mausi in Chidiya Ghar and various characters in Comedy Nights With Kapil and F.I.R, is all set to join The Kapil Sharma Show as Chandan Prabhakar's (Chandu) wife Thandai Devi.

Thandai will enter the show dressed as a bride. Till now, Chandu's wife was said to be living in his village. Apparently, she will finally come to stay with her husband and kid Khajoor (Kartikey Raj).

Also read: Comedy Nights With Kapil comedian Razak Khan passes away

As for Kappu (Kapil Sharma), he can now freely flirt with Lottery (Rochelle Rao) as Chandu's wife will surely keep an eye on her husband.

Chandu, Thandai and Khajoor will now be one happy family.

Also read: After The Kapil Sharma Show, Chris Gayle, Dwayne Bravo set for another Indian reality TV outing?

The Kapil Sharma Show features Sumona Chakravarti, Sunil Grover, Kiku Sharda, Ali Asgar apart from others. It airs every Saturday and Sunday at 9pm on Sony TV.
